schema.database: select '${ENCLOSE_VALUE_SQL}' ||r ||'${SEPARATOR_QTE_SQL}' ||q ||'${ENCLOSE_VALUE_SQL}${TRAIL_SQL}' from ( select 'sqlite_master'r, count(*)q from sqlite_master WHERE type='table' ) {limit}
schema.column: select sql ||'${TRAIL_SQL}' from sqlite_master where tbl_name='${TABLE}' and type='table' {limit}
